name: Neptix
author: BMG MEDIA

sections.description:
This plugin pulls events from Neptix.com and will list all your events, or a single event via a simple shortcode. The plugin automatically defines your event date/time, thumbnail and provides a link for your users to buy tickets directly off Neptix.com. The plugin is customizable with a CSS editor built into the plugin to easily style the plugin to fit your websites existing color scheme.

Visit BMG MEDIA blog post for more information.

User Access

List your events on Neptix.com, once signed into the admin panel, click event tools –> developer API. Your API Key will be displayed for your account.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add Neptix shortcode into a page or post

short_description: This plugin allows you to display recent events from a specific user or venue and or a single event from Neptix.com.
